channel.title: CVE Feed for Proofpoint -- Enterprise Protection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Proofpoint -- Enterprise Protection

item.title: CVE-2024-0862|2024-05-14T19:07:04.897Z -- Proofpoint -- Enterprise Protection
item.description: The Proofpoint Encryption endpoint of Proofpoint Enterprise Protection contains a Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability that allows an authenticated user to relay HTTP requests from the Protection server to otherwise private network addresses.

item.title: CVE-2024-3676|2024-05-14T19:07:19.420Z -- Proofpoint -- Enterprise Protection
item.description: The Proofpoint Encryption endpoint of Proofpoint Enterprise Protection contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker with a specially crafted HTTP request to create additional Encryption user accounts under the attacker's control.Â These accounts are able to send spoofed email to any users within the domains configured by the Administrator.
